General.Name: Nanjing Textiles Import & Export Corp Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Textiles Import & Export Corp., Ltd. imports and exports textiles and garments worldwide. It also develops and produces discharge lamps comprising HPSL and metal halide lamps, and high-pressure mercury lamps; operates an exhibition center; and develops real estate properties. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: No. 77 Yunnan North Road, Nanjing, China
